ARABIC: وَٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He who brings the truth and those who confirm it - those are the people who have taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He who brings the truth and verifies it, -- such are the people who are God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But he who brought the Truth, and those who confirmed it as true, such are the ones who shall be guarded against the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who have brought the truth and have acknowledged it are those who have fear of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those who brought this truth and those who testify for it – these are the pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And he who has brought the truth and (those who) believed therein, they are those who have Taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And he who brings the truth and (he who) accepts it as the truth-- these are they that guard (against evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And he who has come with the very truth and confirms it, those they are the godfearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And whoso bringeth the truth and believeth therein - Such are the dutiful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He who brings the truth, and he who testifies to it as such -- those are surely the people who are God-fearing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And whosoever bringeth the truth, and whosoever giveth credence thereto - these! they are the God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He who brings the truth and he who confirms it—it is they who are the Godwary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And he who brings the Truth and he who confirms (and supports) it - such are the men who do right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And he (Muhammad SAW) who has brought the truth (this Quran and Islamic Monotheism) and (those who) believed therein (i.e. the true believers of Islamic Monotheism), those are Al- Muttaqun (the pious and righteous persons - see V. 2:2).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And he who comes with the truth, and confirms it, those are they who surely fear Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But he who promotes the truth, and testifies to it—these are the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the one who has brought the truth and [they who] believed in it - those are the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:33] And he who brings the truth — and that is the Prophet (s) — and [those] who confirm it, namely, the believers (here alladhī, ‘he who’, has the significance of alladhīna, ‘those who’), those, they are the ones who guard themselves, against idolatry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And whoso bringeth the Truth) the Qur'an and the profession of Allah's divine Oneness, i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) (and believeth therein) and those who believe in him, i.e. Abu Bakr and his fellow believers. (Such are the dutiful) such are those who ward off disbelief, idolatry and indecent acts.
